alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Kidder; La Moure; McLean (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 12:55PM CST until February 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory through this evening, blowing snow expected. For the Winter Weather Advisory Tuesday, snow and blowing snow with total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...McLean, Burleigh, Kidder, and LaMoure counties. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Tuesday to Midnight CST Tuesday Night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
